about.experience: I am an artist with years of experience in drawing with pencil, charcoal, and pens, as well as painting in oil and watercolor. I enjoy creating portraits of people and animals, but I also work with landscapes. My passion for art motivates me to explore different techniques and styles, always seeking to capture the beauty of the world around me. Currently, I reside and work in the city of Essen in Germany.

notes.no_frames_note: Frames are not included with the paintings
notes.one_month_note: It takes one month to be ready due to drying time.
